an4.186:2.2: I don’t see any reason to follow BB in adopting the comm explanation that ummagga and patibhana are terms for wisdom. Compare the Chinese parallels, both of which appear to have an extra term in between the Pali’s two: T 82 有賢道、有賢觀、善辯才 (good (bhaddaka) path, good seeing, good rhetorical skill). MA 172 is similar.
